mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (cust_id, prod_cd, prod_name, prod_qty, tot_prod_price, paymt_pnt) values (#{custId}, #{prodCd}, #{prodName}, #{prodQty}, #{totProdPrice}, #{totProdPrice}/100)
mapper.select: SELECT CUST_ID , (SELECT PROD_CD from cart LIMIT 1) main_prodCd , IF(COUNT(*) > 1, CONCAT((SELECT PROD_NAME FROM cart WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId} LIMIT 1), ' 외 ', COUNT(*)-1, '개'), (SELECT PROD_NAME FROM cart WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId} LIMIT 1)) AS prodName , COUNT(*) totProdCnt , SUM(TOT_PROD_PRICE) totPrc , SUM(PROD_QTY) totQty , SUM(EXPCT_DC_PRC) totDcPrc , CASE WHEN SUM(TOT_PROD_PRICE) >= 30000 THEN 0 ELSE 3000 END dlvPrc , (SUM(TOT_PROD_PRICE) - SUM(EXPCT_DC_PRC) + (CASE WHEN SUM(TOT_PROD_PRICE) >= 30000 THEN 0 ELSE 3000 END)) finPrc FROM cart WHERE CUST_ID = #{custId}
